title: Automate Quickstart bootstrapper
description: Automate the Quickstart bootstrap orchestrator so provisioning, configuration seeding, and telemetry export execute without manual intervention.
acceptance_criteria: Clean-room bootstrap completes without manual actions.|;Telemetry exports are ingested into monitoring dashboards for every run.

title: Implement model registry updater automation
description: Deliver a scheduled model registry updater that reconciles metadata changes, validates schemas, and emits change events to downstream consumers.
acceptance_criteria: Registry updates run on schedule without operator input.|;Invalid metadata is quarantined with actionable alerts.|;Change events deliver to subscribers within one minute.

title: Bundle offline GitHub CLI installer
description: Ship an offline-ready GitHub CLI bundle with checksum verification, automated configuration, and diagnostics suited for air-gapped deployments.
acceptance_criteria: Installer completes on air-gapped hosts without network access.|;Diagnostics confirm CLI functionality against internal mirrors.|;Checksum validation blocks tampered artifacts.

title: Developer onboarding
priority: Extend script into runa bootstrap --auto pipeline that runs cargo build/test/demo non-interactively, captures logs, and asks triage AI to summarize failures into tools/offline_pr_queue/logs/quickstart.
column10: runa bootstrap --auto exits non-zero on failure and writes summary/report without pausing for input.

title: CRC integration
priority: Introduce policy engine evaluating metrics + AI triage on logs to auto-decide pass/fail, escalating only when confidence <0.9; decisions recorded in crc/logs/quality_gate.jsonl.
depends_on: Offline CRC runner with cached metrics fixtures
column10: Gate auto-passes when metrics meet thresholds and AI score ≥0.9, else creates escalation artifact.

title: Relocation daemon
priority: Build rule-based evaluator + AI triage to auto-approve safe actions via runa relocation auto-approve, logging verdicts under .workspace/relocation/logs.
column10: 100% approvals include policy decision log, AI confidence, and rollback command; risky cases queued for manual.

title: Merge tooling
priority: Implement runa merge --auto that replays merge, uses AI code reviewer to draft patches, and reruns verification before updating queue.
depends_on: Git worktree sandbox + llama.cpp diff assistant
column10: Auto-merge succeeds for ≥95% historical conflict cases in dry-run tests; failures create structured TODO with suggested edits.

title: Documentation
priority: Generate release notes via runa release notes --from-ledger, feeding merged PR ledger into doc-drafter AI, storing drafts under docs/releases/drafts/.
depends_on: Local llama.cpp doc generator + Markdown templates
column10: Every release run produces draft + diff summary + acceptance checklist; human edit optional but not required.

title: Model registry
theme: tools/ai/ollama_manager.sh manual registry edit when yq missing
priority: Add embedded YAML updater (python -m ruamel.yaml fallback) and AI triage to validate registry diffs, preventing manual edits.
depends_on: Bundled Python fallback + llama.cpp diff validator
column10: Command updates registry atomically and writes validation report; manual edit no longer required.

title: Tooling bootstrap
priority: Ship cached GH CLI tarballs under tools/offline_cache/gh/ with runa tools install gh wrapper; AI triage suggests platform-specific fix if install fails.
column10: Installer succeeds offline for supported OS; mismatches raise actionable AI suggestion.
